Dialogue_Fixes.name: KOTOR Dialogue Fixes
Dialogue_Fixes.description: Improve dialogue options and fix spelling errors

Character_Startup_Changes_Patch.name: Character Startup Changes Patch
Character_Startup_Changes_Patch.description: Prevent Character Startup Changes from blocking access to basic weapons and armour

Ajunta_Pall_Appearance.name: Ajunta Pall Appearance
Ajunta_Pall_Appearance.description: Give Ajunta Pall a unique appearance

Ajunta_Pall_Appearance_Patch.name: Ajunta Pall Appearance Patch
Ajunta_Pall_Appearance_Patch.description: Fixes something with Ajunta Pall Appearance, idk

K1_Community_Patch.name: KOTOR Community Patch
K1_Community_Patch.description: Does a great many things, look it up

Specularity_Tweaks.name: Specularity Tweaks
Specularity_Tweaks.description: Alters specularity of the vanilla textures

Duncan_on_Manaan.name: Duncan On Manaan
Duncan_on_Manaan.description: Restores content wherein Deadeye Duncan can be found on Manaan

Scoundrel_Trousers.name: Scoundrel Trousers
Scoundrel_Trousers.description: Fixes very uncomfortable-looking leggings for F!Scoundrel

Republic_Soldier_Fix.name: Republic Soldier Fix
Republic_Soldier_Fix.description: Fix some model problems with Republic soldiers

Shaleena_Lashowe_Mouth_Adjustment.name: Shaleena/Lashowe Mouth Fix
Shaleena_Lashowe_Mouth_Adjustment.description: Fix upper teeth being invisible in Shaleena and Lashowe

Shaleena_Head_Restoration.name: Shaleena Head Restoration
Shaleena_Head_Restoration.description: Restore a unique head intended for Shaleena

Calo_Nord_Recolour.name: Calo Nord Recolour
Calo_Nord_Recolour.description: Give Calo Nord more muted tones

HD_Darth_Malak.name: HD Darth Malak
HD_Darth_Malak.description: Improve the texture of Darth Malak

Juhani_Cathar_Head.name: Juhani Cathar Head
Juhani_Cathar_Head.description: Give Juhani a more canonical head

Korriban_ACDC.name: Korriban Back in Black
Korriban_ACDC.instructions: Select the KOTOR Community Patch compatible option if you use that. Otherwise, choose the Basic Installation.
Korriban_ACDC.description: Make Korriban Academy teachers dress like Dark Jedi

Cloaked_Robes.name: Cloaked Jedi Robes
Cloaked_Robes.instructions: Any option works. Aesthetically, Snigaroo recommends Brown-Red-Blue Alternative

Jedi_Tailor.name: JC's Jedi Tailor
Jedi_Tailor.instructions: If you use Cloaked Robes 100% Brown option, use the compatibility patch AFTER the main installation.
Jedi_Tailor.description: Adds a complete new NPC to Dantooine

HD_HK47.name: HD HK-47
HD_HK47.description: [Observation] The name clearly implies the function of this mod.

HD_Canderous_Order.name: HD Canderous Ordo
HD_Canderous_Order.description: It gives Canderous HD textures? Well, imagine my shock.

HD_Jolee_Bindo.name: HD Jolee Bindo
HD_Jolee_Bindo.description: I'm running out of snarky comments to make. It makes Jolee HD

HD_Zaalbar.name: HD Zaalbar
HD_Zaalbar.description: Make Zaalbar look like he came out of a spa, not a sewer

Star_Map_Revamp.name: Star Map Revamp
Star_Map_Revamp.description: Prettier and more accurate Star Maps

HD_Background_Ships.name: Background Ship Improvements
HD_Background_Ships.description: HD textures for random background ships

HD_Skyboxes.name: HQ Skyboxes II
HD_Skyboxes.description: High quality skyboxes for all planets

HD_Beams.name: HD Beam Effects
HD_Beams.description: High quality effects for beams like Force Lightning

HD_Fire_and_Ice.name: HD Fire and Ice
HD_Fire_and_Ice.description: High quality effects for fire and ice attacks

Animated_Cantina_Sign.name: Animated Cantina Sign
Animated_Cantina_Sign.description: Gives the cantina an animated sign

Reflective_Lightsaber.name: Reflective Lightsaber Blades
Reflective_Lightsaber.instructions: Install only the Modify Standard Lightsaber option

Wookie_Warblade_Fix.name: Wookie Warblade Fix
Wookie_Warblade_Fix.description: Give the warblade a longer handle

Kill_Czerka_Guard.name: Kill the Czerka Guard
Kill_Czerka_Guard.description: Kill a Czerka jerk on Kashyyyk

Korriban_Workbench.name: Korriban Academy Workbench
Korriban_Workbench.description: Add a workbench to the Korriban academy

Sharina_Fizark_Restoration.name: Sharina Fizark Restoration
Sharina_Fizark_Restoration.description: Restore a scene with Sharina Fizark if you help her

Senni_Vek_Restoration.name: Senni Vek Restoration
Senni_Vek_Restoration.description: Add Senni Vek to the fight on Tatooine

Hidden_Bek_Control_Room.name: Hidden Bek Control Room Restoration
Hidden_Bek_Control_Room.description: Restore the control room from the Hidden Bek base

Vision_Enhancement.name: Vision Enhancement
Vision_Enhancement.instructions: Install the Basic Installation. K1R is NOT compatible with iOS
Vision_Enhancement.description: See the player character in their underwear during visions ðŸ˜³

New_Leviathan_Dialogue.name: Leviathan Differentiated Dialogue
New_Leviathan_Dialogue.description: More dialogue with the Rodian on the Leviathan

Pazaak_AntiCheat.name: Balanced Pazaak
Pazaak_AntiCheat.description: Make Pazaak opponents cheat somewhat less

Ebon_Hawk_Camera.name: Ebon Hawk Camera Replacement
Ebon_Hawk_Camera.description: Fix the camera angles on Ebon Hawk

Improved_Grenades.name: Improved Grenades
Improved_Grenades.description: Add demolitions modifier to grenade damage

Tutorial_Remover.name: Tutorial Remover
Tutorial_Remover.description: Remove the tutorial with Trask. This does not remove the Endar Spire

Saber_Throw_Knockdown.name: Saber Throw Knockdown
Saber_Throw_Knockdown.description: Add a knockdown effect to Advanced Saber Throw

Sunry_Trial_Enhancement.name: Sunry Trial Ehancement
Sunry_Trial_Enhancement.description: Add a new cutscene to the Sunry Trial

Recruit_T3M4_Early.name: Recruit T3-M4 Early
Recruit_T3M4_Early.description: Allow recruitment of T3-M4 before Mission

Security_Spikes.name: Security Spikes for K1
Security_Spikes.description: Restore the functionality of the useless security spikes

Republic_Ship_Unknown_World.name: Crashed Republic Cruiser
Republic_Ship_Unknown_World.instructions: If you are using Loadscreens in Colour and/or HD Blasters, install their respective options AFTER the main install.
Republic_Ship_Unknown_World.description: Add a whole new module to the last planet

Republic_Ship_Unknown_World_Patch.name: Crashed Republic Cruiser Patch
Republic_Ship_Unknown_World_Patch.description: Fix the mobile UI for the Crashed Republic Cruiser mod

Trandoshan_Rescale.name: Trandoshans Rescaled
Trandoshan_Rescale.description: Make Trandoshans tall, like in canon

Custom_Selkath_Animation.name: Selkath Angry Animation
Custom_Selkath_Animation.description: Add an angry animation to Selkaths

Sneak_Attack_10_Restoration.name: Sneak Attack 10 Restoration
Sneak_Attack_10_Restoration.description: Restore the Sneak Attack 10 feat for Scoundrels

Sherruk_Lightsaber.name: Sherruk with Lightsabers
Sherruk_Lightsaber.description: Give lightsabers to Sherruk, the Mandalorian on Dantooine

Sherruk_Lightsaber_Patch.name: Sherruk Lightsaber Patch
Sherruk_Lightsaber_Patch.description: Fix for the Sherruk with Lightsabers mod

Helena_Shan_Improvement.name: Helena Shan Improvement
Helena_Shan_Improvement.description: Make Helena Shan look more like her daughter

Bastila_Dark_Bodysuit.name: Bastila's Dark Bodysuit
Bastila_Dark_Bodysuit.description: Give Bastila a new bodysuit on the last planet

Taris_Dueling_Adjustment.name: Dueling Arena Adjustment
Taris_Dueling_Adjustment.description: Fix several bugs at the Tarisian dueling arena

Bendak_Light_Side.name: Bendak Light Side Option
Bendak_Light_Side.description: Kill Bendak without gaining dark side points

Kashyyyk_Forcefield_Rework.name: Kashyyyk Forcefield Rework
Kashyyyk_Forcefield_Rework.description: Let Jolee unlock the force field in a more immersive fashion

Engine_Lab_Bench.name: Engine Lab Bench for Swoop Accelerator
Engine_Lab_Bench.description: Move the very expensive engine off the floor

Missing_Lamp_Fix.name: Missing Lamp Fix
Missing_Lamp_Fix.instructions: Install the main and optional choices
Missing_Lamp_Fix.description: Restore lamps to the Rakatan temple

Sith_Soldier_Texture.name: Sith Soldier Texture Restoration
Sith_Soldier_Texture.instructions: Either main or alternate install works
Sith_Soldier_Texture.description: Restore unique armour for elite Sith

Diversified_Wounded_Soldiers.name: Diversified Wounded Soldiers
Diversified_Wounded_Soldiers.description: Use different models for wounded soldiers

Diversified_Jedi_Captives.name: Diversified Jedi Captives
Diversified_Jedi_Captives.instructions: Install the main mod. Dantooine option also works.
Diversified_Jedi_Captives.description: Use different models for captive Jedi

Dodonna_Transmission.name: Dodonna's Transmission
Dodonna_Transmission.description: Fix light-side player character being invisible in endgame cutscenes

Movie_Style_Holograms_Endgame.name: Movie-style Holograms (Endgame)
Movie_Style_Holograms_Endgame.description: HD holograms for the endgame cutscenes

Movie_Style_Holograms_Puzzle.name: Movie-style Holograms (Twisted Rancor Trio)
Movie_Style_Holograms_Puzzle.description: HD holograms for the Twisted Rancor Trio puzzle

Elder_Droids_Unique_Voice.name: Elder Droids Unique Voice
Elder_Droids_Unique_Voice.description: Make Elder Droids speak Ancient Selkath

Ajunta_Swords.name: Ajunta Pall's Swords
Ajunta_Swords.instructions: Do NOT use the Weapon Model Overhaul version

Ajunta_Pall_Blade.name: Ajunta Pall's Blade
Ajunta_Pall_Blade.instructions: Install the compatibility option, if applicable, AFTER the main install
Ajunta_Pall_Blade.description: Give Ajunta Pall's true sword a unique appearance

Mandalorian_Armour.name: JC's Mandalorian Armour
Mandalorian_Armour.instructions: Install option A, then extra textures

Weapon_Stats_Rebalance.name: Weapon Stats Rebalance
Weapon_Stats_Rebalance.description: Use K2's rebalanced stats in K1

Dantooine_Training_Lightsaber.name: Dantooine Training Lightsabers
Dantooine_Training_Lightsaber.description: Give player character training lightsabers on Dantooine

Visual_Effects.name: Realistic Visual Effects
Visual_Effects.description: Unrealism, in a Star Wars game? Impossible!

NPC_Alignment_Fix.name: NPC Alignment Fix
NPC_Alignment_Fix.description: Fix NPC alignments to get bonus damage

EZ_Swoop_Racing.name: EZ Swoop Racing
EZ_Swoop_Racing.description: Win all swoop races after Taris

Walking_Animation_Fix.name: Walking Animation Fix
Walking_Animation_Fix.description: Fix the weird walking animation bug

Untold_Love_Story.name: Untold Love Story
Untold_Love_Story.description: Remove gender-based checks for various NPC interactions

Romancing_Of_Bastila.name: The Romancing of Bastila
Romancing_Of_Bastila.description: Allow F!Player to romance Bastila. Also fixes a bug for dark-siders of any gender

Impossible_Mode_Restored.name: Impossible Mode Restored
Impossible_Mode_Restored.description: Restore the most difficult game mode

Slave_Bastila.name: JC's Slave Bastila for K1
Slave_Bastila.description: Give Bastila a slave outfit when you rescue her from the Vulkars instead of her underwear

Better_Slave_Bastila.name: Exotic Costume of Bastila
Better_Slave_Bastila.description: A more luxurious appearance to JCarter426's Slave Bastila mod

HD_Terminal.name: HD Terminal
HD_Terminal.description: Higher resolution for the computer terminals

Animated_Ebon_Hawk_Screen.name: Animated Ebon Hawk Screen
Animated_Ebon_Hawk_Screen.description: Animate the screens in the cockpit of the Ebon Hawk

HD_Scoundrel.name: HD Scoundrel Uniform
HD_Scoundrel.description: A higher resolution uniform for the Scoundrel class

HD_Scout.name: HD Scout Uniform
HD_Scout.description: A higher resolution uniform for the Scout class

HD_Soldier.name: HD Soldier Uniform
HD_Soldier.description: A higher resolution uniform for the Soldier class

Spare_Mission.name: Spare Mission and Zaalbar
Spare_Mission.description: Give the option to spare Mission and Zaalbar for dark-side players

Remove_Alignment_Lock.name: Remove Force Alignment Restrictions
Remove_Alignment_Lock.description: Remove the alignment lock on some items, e.g., the Solari crystal

Kill_Gorton.name: Kill Gorton
Kill_Gorton.description: Adds the option to kill the Anti-Alien League guy on Taris
